name: In the House of Silence
description:
In the House of Silence is a casual survival horror roguelike influenced by classic weird fiction.

Streamlined But Difficult

In the House of Silence is a traditional roguelike that features no RPG elements such as experience points, randomized damage, or even equippable items. However, this streamlining does not make the game any less difficult. Experience tactical depth that arises from digestible rules.

Stave Off Insanity

Manage your level of sanity as it diminishes with every turn. Insanity will alter your perceptions of reality.

Mutate Into Something Inhuman

Mutate to change gain new abilities at the expense of your sanity level and physical form.

Explore Procedurally Generated Environments

Explore the ever-changing House of Silence, with each floor having its own unique feel through visuals, sounds, enemies, and map generators.

Fight or Flee

Choose to fight or sneak past the eldritch abominations that lurk in the darkness.
